name: Blind Girl
description:
The Blind Girl is an optional storytelling adventure game in which you explore to continue the story.

The girl who became blind after the witch took her eyes, goes forward with her shadow fairy’s help.

Would this girl be able to find her eyes back?
And would this be the whole story?
Would they be able to have a happy ending?

Everything is up to your “choice.”

*Key features
Simple operation with the keyboard.
Mysterious and beautiful graphic.
A fairy tale-like story.
Three multi-ending that the user can choose while proceeding with the story.
